meaning_str.bing:
n. 蒸汽；水蒸气；水汽；蒸汽动力
v. 蒸发；散发蒸汽；冒水汽；蒸（食物）
网络. 水蒸汽

蒸汽；水蒸气；水汽；蒸汽动力
蒸发；散发蒸汽；冒水汽；蒸（食物）

蒸汽；水汽；水蒸气；蒸汽动力；蒸汽机车；气雾；水汽；蒸汽船；轮船；乘船旅行；<口>力量；精力；情绪紧张
蒸（食物）；蒸发；蒸煮；冒蒸汽；用蒸汽加热；靠蒸汽动力行驶；蒸汽处理；蒸汽弄湿；蒸洗；蒸熟；蒸馏；生气；发怒；快速行走；使劲干；<俚>聚众对…行劫
蒸汽的；含有蒸汽的；输送蒸汽的；蒸汽推动的；用蒸汽处理的；<英口>普通的；一般的；常规的

1.en: Most people know electricity standing still is no more useful than is a stationary belt between a steam engine and a machine to be driven.
1.cn: 大多数人认为，停滞不动的电并不比架设在蒸汽机和要被传动的机器之间的固定带更有用。

2.en: That could take some of the steam out of China's nascent recovery, and with it a return in healthy demand for oil.
2.cn: 这可能削弱中国刚刚开始的经济复苏的一部分动力，同时阻碍原油需求回归正常水平。

3.en: The long hot streak at the box office seems to be losing steam, just as the summer hits.
3.cn: 在夏季来临之际，美国票房持续已久的火爆形势看来要失去动力了。

0.en: All this time I never knew there were steam tunnels down here.
0.cn: 我从来不知道这下面里有蒸汽通道。

1.en: Place the steam wand halfway in the pitcher at a 45-degree angle until the milk is 103 degrees.
1.cn: 把蒸汽管放到罐子的中间，成45度夹角 直到牛奶有103度热。

2.en: Well, according to my research, the steam tunnels below this access point should be the closest analog to the mines.
2.cn: 根据我的调查，这个入口下面的蒸汽通道和矿井的环境最为相似。

3.en: I once gave myself an official reprimand for conducting a meeting in the shower. The steam warped my gavel.
3.cn: 我曾经就自己边洗澡边开会给了自己一个官方的谴责。蒸汽把我的木槌弄弯了。

4.en: Only a few blocks away you'll find the Powerhouse Museum, a celebration of steam, space, and science.
4.cn: 走过几条街便是发电厂博物馆，是为了庆祝纪念蒸汽引擎，航天技术和科学而建的。

5.en: How does it work? It is steam powered. I just push this little lever. What a fantastic paddle boat.
5.cn: 他要怎么前进？他是靠蒸汽行驶的。我只要打开这个小小的开关。真是一艘奇妙的名轮船。

6.en: Hey, they're going to the gym together. Two women. Stretching. You know they take a steam together. Things get a little playful.
6.cn: 她们一起上健身房耶，两个女人，劈腿拉筋，她们洗蒸汽浴，开始互相逗弄。

7.en: In the mid-nineteenth century, the Swiss invention of milling with steam-driven steel rollers put paid to most of those community relationships.
7.cn: 在19世纪中期，瑞士人发明了用蒸汽驱动的滚磨，结束了大多数的社区关系。

8.en: Oh, I like all kinds of trains, steam, diesel, coal, elevated, bullet. I defy you to name a train that I don't like.
8.cn: 我喜欢所有火车啊，蒸汽火车，柴油火车，煤炭火车,高架列车,子弹列车。你有本事就说出个我不喜欢的火车。

9.en: And then at this stage I'm just going to add a little bit of water to help the mushrooms cook and steam and allow them to soak up all the rest of the flavors that the beef left in the wok.
9.cn: 现在要向锅内加入一点水，水蒸汽能帮助煮熟香菇，还有利于蘑菇吸收锅里煎牛肉剩下的酱汁。

10.en: Hey, will you steam my uniform next?
10.cn: 弄好可以也烫下我的制服吗？

11.en: This is gonna be so much more accurate than the steam room at the gym.
11.cn: 这个会比健身房里的桑拿房更接近真实环境吧。

12.en: Hop aboard. Quick, Daddy. Splice the main brace. Chocks away. Full steam ahead.
12.cn: 快上来！快点！爸爸！我们要出发啦!热气器升空！现在全速前进！

13.en: Why shouldn't the guy let off a little steam? You know damn well why. Back off!
13.cn: 男人为什么不能适当发泄一下？你唯恐天下不乱吗？走开。

14.en: You know, when I wanna blow off steam. Drink TaB, play Robotron, listen to Duran Duran.
14.cn: 当我想放松一下的时候，我会喝健怡可乐 玩《机器人大战》，听杜兰杜兰乐队的歌。

15.en: And you can add just a tiny bit of water, just to help them cook and create a bit of steam.
15.cn: 你可以加一点点水，制造些水蒸气，加快煮熟速度。

16.en: But, if, and... Oh, God, it's a big if. But what if... support for Claire picks up steam...
16.cn: 但是如果，仅仅是如果，但是如果对克莱尔的支持成了气候…

17.en: Grandpa, can we ride in Gertrude? Hop aboard. Full steam ahead. Bye bye, Granny. See you later.
17.cn: 爷爷我们能坐格特鲁德吗？你们快上来吧！全速前进！再见，奶奶！一会儿见！

18.en: Now, to prepare the wraps, steam some ready made Chinese pancakes or you could use tortilla wraps.
18.cn: 现在来做饼，蒸一些做好的中式饼皮，或者直接用玉米薄饼。

19.en: Sorry, Madam Gazelle. Never mind, you're just in time. All aboard. Ms. Rabbit is the bus driver, full steam ahead. See you later.
19.cn: 抱歉，羚羊夫人。没关系，刚好来得及。上车吧。兔小姐是司机，出发咯。再见。
